item.title: Heeelp
item.dc:creator: @luke12345 luke12345
item.description:
@luke12345 wrote:

have you got your server running at the same time??? if so them type in the server section localhost and it should join!!! if not then i dont know maybe it might be your firewall make a port in your firewall for the client to acess and then it might work.

if u havent got a server and your just trying to conect to some ones server them its either the server is down or its just your firewall in most cases its your firewall stopping it gain acess so just create a port for it and let it have acess and it should work if none of that help then i have no idea.
luke

are you trying to log on your own server or some1 elses???

if your are trying to log on your own then you need to start your server leave that running in the background them start up the client you are using.
once you have done that put your user name inot the client and then your pass then put in the IP:localhost and that should connect to your server because i use the same thing and it works for me.
luke

see if that helps i posted that to someone else with the same problem
luke

Read full topic
